abilities.name: Devil's Sight.
abilities.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

abilities.name: Flyby.
abilities.description: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

abilities.name: Limited Spines.
abilities.description: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
